  • Klassen
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    ExamScreenVBox
    This class combines the UpperGridPane and the LowerGridPane to create the general exam screen in a vertical layout.
    LowerGridPane
    The GridPane represents the lower part of the exam screen.
    UpperGridPane
    This class extends GridPane represents the upper part of the exam screen, providing fields for general data.
